name: SPACE RUN (itch) (space developer)
description:
• Play over 50 Levels
  • PVP Battle includet
  • PVC Battle includet
  • 100 % Fun

In this game

you have to navigate a spark to the End of a labyrinth. But that isn't easy! Try it out!

IMPORTANT INFORMATION!!! If there are 10 Downloads it will give a GRAPHIC UPDATE!

Controls:

- One Player

Playermovement --> Arrow Buttons

Home --> h

- Two Player

Playermovement --> Arrow Buttons or ASWD

Home --> h
